cards.title: Education from the AMA Code of Medical Ethics
cards.description: Helping physicians, medical students and all health care professionals address ethical challenges that arise in patient care.

card_group.title: Continuing Medical Education
card_group.description: Education from the AMA offers continuing medical education and other learning modules for physicians who strive to practice ethically. Topic filters allow users to select educational offerings that meet their individual needs.
